A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointed by the posted score by the audience. Perfect movie\, no... but a great roller coaster of a ride! This is not the Star Wars we grew up with\, perhaps... but let's remember Ep IV was not well received originally\, plenty of hokey stuff going on there as well. Embrace the future\, give up the past... Riam Johnson is taking us somewhere here and it's logical. Absolutely gorgeous film
